name: jess
description: Stylesheet influenced by Pico CSS and Fluent UI from Microsoft

scripts.build: npm run jess && postcss ./dist/jess.css > ./dist/jess.min.css && npm run build-theme && npm run copy-to-docs
scripts.copy-to-docs: node ./node_modules/copyfiles/copyfiles -u 1 dist/jess.min.css docs/css && node ./node_modules/copyfiles/copyfiles -u 1 dist/default-theme.min.css docs/css && node ./node_modules/copyfiles/copyfiles -u 2 docsrc/css/documentation.css docs/css

author: Jelmer Veen <www.github.com/pennions>
